decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s): drg no. 23.08-11-rev B - PROPOSED NEW GATES AND FENCE
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be as per approved drawings and application form.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7C & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, HC1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023) - Section 12 and 16
description: Alterations to the front court involving the installation of new driveway gates, a new pedestrian access gate and a new metal fence over existing boundary wall
